definition: to handle/to manage/to put in order/to arrange/to administer/to execute/to take action on/to plan
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out
evacuation/measures to evacuate a building in an emergency

pinyin: lian2 bang1 jin3 ji2 cuo4 shi1 shu3

sentences.english: To solve the problem, the welding joint construction was re-designed and argon-arc welding was employed.
sentences.chinese: 解決措施爲採用氬弧焊，改進焊接結構設計等。

sentences.english: Safety measures co-evolve with the development of the technology.
sentences.chinese: 安全措施與技術的發展共同演化。

sentences.english: Four measures of anti-interference are introduced briefly.
sentences.chinese: 最後簡單介紹了四種抗干擾措施。

sentences.english: Other ideas include encouraging guests to reuse towels and linens.
sentences.chinese: 其他措施包括鼓勵客人重複使用毛巾和牀單。

sentences.english: Objective To study the emergency rescue of basicranial fracture complicated with massive hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱底骨折並鼻腔大出血的急診治療措施。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effective nursing in three-stage prevention of periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索一種有效落實牙周病的三期預防的護理措施。

sentences.english: This is in addition to the seven villages that have now been remediated.
sentences.chinese: 這一數字不包括現在正採取整治措施的七個村莊。

sentences.english: Every country in Eastern Europe took at least one step to make things easier for business.
sentences.chinese: 東歐各國都爲簡化商業手續至少採取了一項措施。

sentences.english: The temporary concrete lining guard wall method was used in excavating vertical shaft.
sentences.chinese: 豎井開挖採用了臨時混凝士襯砌護壁措施。

sentences.english: All patients were enforced recumbency and treated with large amount of fluid.
sentences.chinese: 治療措施包括臥牀休息，大量補充液體。

sentences.english: These measures can improve drilling efficiency and well completion quality.
sentences.chinese: 這些措施，可有效提高鑽效，提高成井質量。

sentences.english: Conclusion Take some effective measures to enhance the transferring rate of TB patients successfully.
sentences.chinese: 結論採取有效的措施，提高病人的轉診到位率。

sentences.english: Will the Chinese government request the Ecuadorian government to take necessary measures in this regard?
sentences.chinese: 是否要求厄瓜多爾政府採取必要措施？

sentences.english: "Upon detection, severe administrative punishments, including heavy fines and revocations of operating licenses, will be meted out, " it said.
sentences.chinese: 在監督下，將採取包括重大罰款和吊銷執照等措施。

sentences.english: Power supply enterprise to reduce line loss rate is an important means to improve economic benefit.
sentences.chinese: 降低線損率是供電企業提高經濟效益的重要措施。

sentences.english: The factors affecting the safety of quick-frozen food and the quality control measures were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 該文探討了影響速凍食品安全的因素和質量控制措施。

definition: to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
to officially launch (a policy, program etc)/to appear on stage/to appear publicly/(of a bar girl) to leave with a client
countermeasure for dealing with a situation
